website_summaries.verdict: A must have for anyone who wants a good looking, large-capacity model that also boasts Oster's quality and customer support.
pros: Stands out for its wide mouth 7-cup jar – a full cup larger than similar models in its price range
Has 6 speeds and 700 watts of power
cons: Few reports of malfunctions, but customer service was attentive
Some owners gripe about "chunks" remaining after blending food or ice

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one in 10 years
customer_reviews.text: 10 years ago my mom bought me this same blender. One day it just didn't come on anymore. I bought a new one so I can use my old pitcher as a second. It gets used almost every day to blend up breakfast smoothies. Blasts through ice like a breeze. Frozen fruits too. Holds plenty and is quite a workhorse. I completely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Took me forever to pick out a blender and I mean read more reviews than I care to admit. I decided to finally pull the trigger and get this terrific blender. Oster is a great name which made me free comfortable and was delivered and felt like this is a high quality blender. The jar is nice glass and feels like it should be more expensive. The blender has been great for milkshakes and protein shakes so far. Smoothies are the next plan. Blends well and been easy to clean as well which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: McLovin

customer_reviews.title: Too powerful for just cutting and chopping
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty machine. Powerful to crush ice but for the same reason it is not good for chopping herbs and delicate items. It is crushing everything even on a lower setting. I was used to my previous Oster which was doing a much subtler job. This version is too powerful for just cutting and chopping. For this reason I gave it 3 stars but really if you are in the market for something powerful, this is your machine.
customer_reviews.author: NFP

customer_reviews.title: Wait was worthy!
customer_reviews.text: I was not too happy because I took more than a week to arrive and I needed it ASAP, but definitely the wait is worthy; this blended is better than I expected, it has a beautiful and modern design+ it is easy to use, has a lot of potency, and it has enough blending capacity. So I am happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love the wide base at the bottom. It blends smoothies much faster and yes it crushes ice!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t blend frozen fruit well for smoothies on any settings. Would not re purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We previously had an Oster blender and it worked great for smoothies. This one doesn’t work as well. Particularly when it comes to blending pieces of frozen fruit I’ve found it leaves some chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey McGoldrick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good blender
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean , wish It could cut through frozen fruit faster
customer_reviews.author: momtofoures

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't crush ice
customer_reviews.text: Worst blenderever. Clearly engineered to last, but it literaly won't make smoothies, does not crush icelike pictures show
customer_reviews.author: Matt j

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: Great price. The glass container is large and easy to clean. Breaks down ice very easily and makes great smoothies. An excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Devoted Dad

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: This blender works well, but you need ear protection. Seriously. Careful of the lid, it tore within 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Roberts

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: The appearance is very fresh, the sound small capacity is big, can be enough for our whole family to use
customer_reviews.author: Angélica Sahli

customer_reviews.title: Great with ice
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product and I use a lot of ice
customer_reviews.author: ruby a.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Powerful blending for smoothies once I figured out the order in which to put ingredients in. I put liquid in first, then protein powder etc, but I also make sure any greens go in so they ate close to the liquid or they take forever to chop up completely. I put the ice in last because with it in before other ingredients it becomes too thick to continue to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gass

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an Oster that we've had for many years. My wife says it works great. Crushes ice and leaves no chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Marine

customer_reviews.title: Your heartbeat isn't the only thing pulsing!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful machine, which is great for making frozen and mixed fruit drinks. My wife used it often right out of the box and couldn't be happier. The "ice crush" function is nice. A pulsing setting so materials can fall to the bottom to get chopped if they are missed the first couple of times. Very easy to clean and maintain, it fits in the dishwasher (lower rack) without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Luc

customer_reviews.title: Smoothie King
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this for smoothies and like the fact that you can make a lot and the pitcher stands by itself and has good ergonomics to fit in the fridge door. It does need more time to blend stuff though and is loud. But the metal drive and pourable lid are also nice features that outweigh the flaw of blend time. Overall if your into smoothies and don't mind giving the blender time to run it's a great blender.
customer_reviews.author: Performance One

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, uncomplicated, thick glass excellent when mixed hot ingredients, has pluse tab to crush ice.
customer_reviews.author: Fur mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender, good price
customer_reviews.text: seems to be a great blender, with good speeds. Love the oval shape. Have not however tried ice crushing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin P. Poole, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: The best blender ever had. Thank you. Ist more hard working than the traditional ones. I also bought milkshakes blending accesories and its less noisee than their oster cousins.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Vanegas F

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. We use it alot to make iced coffees and it does the trick just fine. I can turn it on and it will turn off once all the ice is done crushing.
customer_reviews.author: chicanamama

customer_reviews.title: Not a great blender
customer_reviews.text: Not great. The blender had a very cheap feeling to it. I would suggest spending a little more. The base is plastic and looks it. Very light and wobbled! The pitcher was good. The blending also could be a little better. The drinks setting did not blend my drink and left pieces of fruit in the drink. Not a $60.00 value, maybe a $30.00 item. Spend a litle more, or less for another blender!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff H

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Always had Oster Blenders and I was expecting this model to be great; Problems: Too heavy; the cup doesn't fit snugly to the base; the high speed is weak; doesn't blend anything all the way (not even tomato sauce).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All metal, sturdy, great to crush ice ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great if you’re crushing ice for smoothies, etc. - all metal materials means no plastic pieces grinding up and lasts forever. This is my second one - actually still using the first one (4+ years) but all metal is hard to find at a reasonable price so bought this for when the first finally gives up.
customer_reviews.author: Travelin' Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender is very nice. It blends and chops well. It crushes ice in orange juice without sticking or clumping. The base support allows you to set the blender canister down like a pitcher easily and stable. The drawback to this blender is that all of this comes with a much larger foot print than a traditional blender and the shape of the unit restricts the handle direction to right or left only for storage, you cannon set the pitcher in the blender so the handle faces backward or forward. A good blender to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: S. Templar

customer_reviews.title: ... ago and its still crushing ice and frozen fruits like crazy =)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender over 4 years ago and its still crushing ice and frozen fruits like crazy =).. The only bad thing is I just cracked the glass jar 2 days ago and i can't seem to find it for sale separately anywhere. Im still making it function and yes i would recommend it to anyone that asks me, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality glass
customer_reviews.text: The glass is thick and heavy. Very good quality. Super durable for ice. Love Love Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Wade

customer_reviews.title: The Non-Blending Blender
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with this blender. I have never owned a blender that pauses as it crushes ice. It seemed right when it started to crush then it paused. It never seem to get really get going. I felt it was very loud. I too got out a spoon and mixed up the ingredients of my smoothie. I will be returning this item. I really like the design but not its functionality. :(
customer_reviews.author: Loubird

customer_reviews.title: Useless waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Every morning I have a banana smoothie. My day won't start until I have one. When I unboxed this blender I was impressed with the solid looking build and nice design, but... what a disappointment. My old tired cheap plastic built blender was able to turn a banana, a spoonful of honey, a bit of cinnamon and a glass of milk into a delicious and creamy beverage, while this fancy, expensive and loud (yes, it is very noisy) piece of uselessness cuts the banana in a handful of large chunks and that's all. No smoothie for me today. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blender
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little unit. I've crushed ice with it, even. Mind you, not a full pitcher of it but five or six cubes and it works like a charm. Seems to be a good unit. I'll let you know in a year or two which seems to be the standard lifespan of blenders nowadays. I like it, though. It doesn't take up a lot of room on the counter, either. Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Drink Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty little blender. Sturdy and well made. The chrome is high end and stunning. The 7 cups makes it excellent for full batches of drinks. Glass is solid and the measurement lines/marks are helpful. My favorite feature is the ice crushing setting. Very mush worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mena

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this blender for over five years and I use it every single day to make a protein smoothie in the morning with frozen strawberries and blueberries. It is loud, but has never failed. I occasionally have to tip it backwards at an angle while it runs to cycle large chunks into the blades. It is very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oster's 6 speed blender is just what I was looking for. It is efficient, easy to clean, well constructed, and not too pricey. I have used this blender on a nearly-daily basis and have had no problems with food being left in larger pieces and the same for ice. Smoothies and other cold drinks blend up smoothly with little work, while vegetables and fruits chop nicely for sauces. I will be purchasing another Oster 6 speed blender for my motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: lettetia

customer_reviews.title: A Little Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This brand has always delivered great products, but this partular blender doesn't do as well. The blades are very short, the ice doesn't crush properly and it sounds like the motor is going to die if you run it too long. On the good side: soft foods, like fresh banana, melon, etc. blend well and the pulser works great on those. It's the frozen items that don't work too well, so smoothies are okay, but frozen drinks are not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Perfect Moment

product_meta.title: Oster, 7-Cup BLSTDG-B 6 Speed, 7-Cup Blender, Black-BLSTDG-B00-000, 7 Cup, Black
product_meta.description:
Versatile blender for chopping, grinding, blending, pureeing, ice-crushing, and more. view larger Stainless-steel blade chops and grinds. view larger All-metal drive system ensures long-lasting, reliable performance. view larger 7-cup dishwasher-safe Boroclass glass jar can handle extreme temperature changes. view larger Lid with snap-open spout for mess-free pouring. view larger 
Soft-touch electronic control pad with 6 speed settings, including "pulse", "ice crush", and "drinks". view larger Oval-shaped blending jar conveniently fits in refrigerator door. view larger OSTER BLSTDG-B PRE-PROGRAMMED BLENDER WITH 7-CUP GLASS JAR
Attractively housed in black with sleek stainless-steel accents, this BLSTDG blender by Oster makes a useful addition to any kitchen, whether blending up a protein shake or fruit smoothie for breakfast or trying your hand at creamy dips and other hors d'oeuvres for a Friday night soiree.

HEAVY-DUTY 450-WATT MOTOR
Thanks to its powerful 450-watt motor, the BLSTDG blender can take on a variety of everyday tasks. Put it to use when making red pepper hummus, a toasted walnut spread, or creamy potato soup--or to prepare toppings for a homemade pizza, like chopped onions, green peppers, and other favorites. Of course it also blends strawberry smoothies and chocolate milk shakes to utterly decadent perfection.

STAINLESS-STEEL ICE-CRUSHING BLADE
Transform your home into party central. Fitted with a stainless-steel ice-crushing blade, the powerful blender transforms ice cubes into crushed ice in seconds. Thoroughly crushed ice with no large chunks means smooth, delicious frosty drinks are a snap to make, any time. From margarita Mondays to Friday night daiquiris--a festive frozen drink can set the tone to any successful soiree.

In addition to crushing ice, the versatile blender with its sharp stainless-steel blade also functions as a grinder. Use it to grind peanuts, pecans, almonds, and other hard nuts--or to grind coffee beans for a rich, flavorful brew.

ALL-METAL DRIVE SYSTEM FOR LASTING DURABILITY
Made in North America, the Oster BLSTDG blender provides the superior quality of an all-metal drive system. The system's two connecting pieces are made of durable metal (instead of plastic), which means reliable, long-lasting, high-quality performance from one party to the next, year after year. 

SOFT-TOUCH ELECTRONIC CONTROL PAD WITH 6 SPEED SETTINGS
The blender's easy-to-clean soft-touch electronic control pad comes with pre-programmed settings for consistent results and simple one-touch operation. Choose from six speed settings: low, medium, high, pulse, ice crush, or drinks. The "pulse" setting allows for precise blending; the pre-programmed "ice crush" setting pulses on high for 30 seconds then shuts of automatically; and the pre-programmed "frozen drinks" setting runs on high for 45 seconds then shuts of automatically.

7-CUP BOROCLASS GLASS JAR
Uniquely designed, the included 7-cup glass blending jar comes fitted with an easy-pour lid with a snap-open spout--simply lift the spout cover to pour; there's no need to remove the entire lid. For added convenience, the jar's oval shape allows it to fit neatly in the refrigerator door--great for keeping mixed drinks cold during a party.

The blending jar is both dishwasher-safe and scratch-resistant, and it's made of Boroclass--a glass that's been thermal-shock tested to withstand extreme temperature changes, which means the jar can be pulled from a steamy hot dishwasher and safely used to blend up a frosty cold beverage seconds later. Other highlights include a generous side handle, a drip-free pouring spout, and measuring marks up the side.

Engineered to impress, the BLSTDG blender beautifully merges savvy innovation with user-friendly simplicity. You'll be in awe of what you can create. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Oster BLSTDG blender, 7-cup glass jar with lid, user manual
feature_bullets: Electronic pre-programmed settings for consistent results and convenient one-touch operation
Lid with snap-open spout for easy serving and no mess
Oster All Metal Drive for lasting durability
6 cup dishwasher safe and scratch resistant glass jar is thermal shock tested to withstand extreme temperature
PreProgrammed Smart Settings Technology takes the guesswork out of blending with easy, one-touch controls for expert results
Crush Pro 4 Blade uses stainless steel, 4-point design to pulverize and chop with precision
7-Cup Boroclass Glass Jar is dishwasher safe for easy clean up
Snap-close, easy pour spout on lid for easy serving
All Metal Drive is extra durable for a metal-to-metal connection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
